| HistoryText             = [[Vali Halfling (Earth-616)|Agamemnon]], half-human and half-Asgardian god, was born immortal, and, though he never physically aged beyond the age of 16, the Pantheon are all his descendants. Stationed in the [[Nevada (State)|Nevada]] desert based headquarters called [[Mount|The Mount]], the Pantheon have recruited the [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]] as a member and ally, and the team joined him on several adventures. Internal struggles and the devious actions of Agamemnon and former team member [[Nathan Taylor (Earth-616)|Paris]] led to the Pantheon's eventual pilgrimage away from The Mount, and ultimately to their recruitment by the United States government. Members of the team possess super strength, a healing factor, and are able to create energy formed weaponry.{{Citation}}
